info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN PREBLE AND SOUTHERN DARKE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near New Paris, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Arcanum, New Paris, New Madison, Wayne Lakes, Eldorado, West Manchester, Gordon, Palestine, Ithaca, Castine and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
